name: mbin
description: Mbin is a federated blogging and discussion platform using ActivityPub. It allows multi-topic communities, rich posts, comments, moderation, and federation features similar to Mastodon or Lemmy.
features: Federated platform: Connect with other ActivityPub instances to share content across the fediverse.
Multi-topic communities: Create and moderate topic-based communities for focused discussions.
Rich post format: Share text, links, images, and videos with formatting and embedded media.
Comment threads: Engage in nested comment discussions with voting and sorting options.
Moderation tools: Remove content, ban users, and manage community rules with comprehensive mod tools.
User profiles: Customize profiles with bio, avatar, and view posting history and statistics.
Voting system: Upvote and downvote posts and comments to surface quality content.
Subscription management: Follow specific communities or users to curate your content feed.
Cross-posting: Share content across multiple communities simultaneously.
Search functionality: Find posts, comments, and communities using full-text search.
Mobile responsive: Access and participate from any device with responsive web interface.
API access: Build custom clients or integrations using the ActivityPub-compatible API.
